content.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Our mentors are essential to the success of our student founders. The mentorship commitment is 90 minutes on one Saturday. If you are interested in becoming a Rice Ventures mentor or learning more about the service engagement, please apply below or contact our team.\n\n","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The Rice Ventures Board is a driven and innovative group of students who want to bolster the entrepreneurship ecosystem at Rice University. If you have ideas on how to do this, please fill out a leadership team application. We are always looking to collaborate with passionate people who know how they can add value to Rice Ventures. 


","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}
